title: TOO MUCH
description: In TOO MUCH, a young woman embarks on a journey of self-discovery and resilience as she navigates the challenges of mental health, addiction, and systemic dysfunction within the demanding field of military medicine. From the sunny shores of Honolulu to the sterile halls of military hospitals, Cindy Lee Neighbors' life takes an unexpected turn as she grapples with the complexities of trauma, addiction, and a system that seems designed to break her.This gripping memoir is a testament to the resilience of the human spirit, a raw and honest exploration of one woman's fight to reclaim her sanity, her voice, and her future.
author: Cindy Lee Neighbors
